title: Princes Street Port Melbourne
creator_credit: Lyn McLeavy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: A tribute to a suburb, a family and a lady who liked to play the piano and sing the blues. Lyn McLeavey describes growing up in Port Melbourne in the 1950s, blending in the harsh realities of life as the daughter of a traumatised ‘wharfie’, with the simple joy of the sounds of the streets.
